DOC.brief_title: Clinical Economic Outcomes Oral Anticoagulants Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Had 1 pharmacy claim apixaban warfarin identification period ( 01Jan2013 30Sep2015 ) . The first apixaban warfarin pharmacy claim date identification period designate index date 2 . Patients 18 year old old index date 3 . At least 1 diagnosis atrial fibrillation prior index date , identify medical claim 4 . At least 12 month baseline period prior index date continuous enrollment 1 . Evidence valvular heart disease , transient atrial fibrillation , venous thromboembolism 12month baseline period index date 2 . Evidence pregnancy study period 3 .
